page.title: 12ENTERTAINMENT IN CRUDEN BAY.
page.content: People in Cruden Bay mainly provide their own entertainment. There are various clubs which are usually run in the winter months. There is a local Drama Club which periodically produces short plays in the village hall. There is also an annual concert, which incorporates much of the talent each year. Home entertainment is provided by television and video machines.A van comes round the village with video tapes to rent out.This costs Â£2 per night. Discos are run in the village hall for the younger generation;and dances are run in the local hotels and Golf Club for the adults. The nearest cinema is in Peterhead (9 miles) and theatres in Aberdeen (25 miles).
